headline: CrowdStrike Valuation Tested As AI Code Security Tools Gain Ground
summary: Anthropic has launched Claude Code Security, an AI powered cybersecurity tool that automates code and application security tasks. The release has sparked fresh questions about how established security software providers such as CrowdStrike Holdings (NasdaqGS:CRWD) will compete as AI driven tools gain traction. Industry participants are actively debating what this means for pricing, customer adoption, and product roadmaps across the broader cybersecurity market. CrowdStrike, known for its...

headline: Cybersecurity is 'well positioned in the AI age': 3 stock picks
summary: Global X assistant vice president and research analyst Tejas Dessai joins Market Domination host Josh Lipton to discuss the software sector (IGV), how it's been disrupted by the artificial intelligence (AI) trade, and why he's especially bullish on cybersecurity. Watch the video above to hear some of Dessai's top software and cybersecurity stock picks. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

content.title: Cybersecurity is 'well positioned in the AI age': 3 stock picks
content.description:
Global X assistant vice president and research analyst Tejas Dessai joins Market Domination host Josh Lipton to discuss the software sector (IGV), how it's been disrupted by the artificial intelligence (AI) trade, and why he's especially bullish on cybersecurity.

Watch the video above to hear some of Dessai's top software and cybersecurity stock picks.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
